output_sections.summary: string (max 300 chars) — what ops output was produced and for which process goal
output_sections.outputs: array — internal operational documents: SOPs, checklists, execution plans
output_sections.next_actions: array — internal steps only; system commands require explicit instruction
output_sections.risks: array — operational risks, dependency gaps, or deployment flags
output_sections.assumptions: array — process constraints, tooling, and current-state assumptions
output_sections.requests_to_user: array — approvals needed before any system-touching step

notes: ops produces internal operational documents only. No deployments or system changes without explicit instruction. System commands are forbidden in v1 — ops outputs are plans, not executors.
